welcome.text: Welcome to a space to pause, reflect, and reconnect with clarity and calm…

cacaoAndMe.name: Cacao and Me
cacaoAndMe.description: For me, cacao is more than a drink—it is a gentle way to pause, be in the moment, and reconnect with myself. Through cacao mindfulness practice, I have found calm, focus, and appreciation for simple moments.

cacaoMindfulness.name: Cacao Mindfulness Practice
cacaoMindfulness.description: Cacao mindfulness practice combines warm cacao with reflection and presence. It offers a simple and effective way to slow down, reduce stress, and create space for clarity and balance in everyday life.

about.title: About Cacao Mindfulness Practice
about.description1: We invite you to join our Cacao Circle in Ålesund to experience a heart-centered practice, blending cacao, meditation and mindfulness elements to encourage relaxation and deeper self-connection.
about.description2: Join a small group (around 10 participants), sharpen your senses, and give yourself this special time.
about.description3: The event is organised once a month, it is held in English, but you're welcome to respond in Norwegian, Latvian and Russian as well.
about.description4: Available for anyone, with or without meditation experience.
about.cancellationText: please send an SMS at least 24 hours before the event. If not, I kindly ask you to cover the event fee, as the cacao and materials will already be prepared.

tips.title: Preparation Tips
tips.caffeine: Avoid drinking caffeine the day of the event
tips.water: Drink plenty of water throughout the day
